name: Redaxium (redratic1)
description:
Demo for Redaxium.

While artistically unusual, its 3D world is about three factions, defined by race, that must get along in a post-industrial society. Lagorigana is at the center of it all, a town where all three races reside and do work.

Genre is CRPG,  which means gameplay leans on roleplaying decisions but backed by character stat/attributes and also skill focused.

 You can currently explore places, loot, kill, and die. 

A few quests presently exist.
